ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would definitely recommend CIQLE to my fellow students. It's a great space to learn about the variety of work that can be done in lifecourse research and sociology in general.

I would recommend the workshop to a fellow student. The workshop is a great way to learn about current quantitative research in sociology and to meet with top scholars in the field in an environment that is friendly and supportive.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I have new potential project ideas that come to me as a result of each weeks speakers.

The workshop helped me to stay current with quantitative research in sociology, learning about new methods and datasets that are being explored. The workshop also supported my professional development by connecting me with scholars beyond Yale.
